title: FLASHBACK FRIDAY| #74: The Dark Agenda of the World Economic Forum and the Great Reset
description:
The history of the World Economic Forum leads to the Third Reich, and the plans that they have for humanity do not veer very far from those of the Nazis. The Hugo Boss designed Nazi uniforms have been replaced by Hugo Boss business suits, but the plan for humanity remains the same.

Isn’t it strange that the WEF was part of the Event 201 simulation in October of 2019 that roleplayed the outbreak of a Coronavirus that came from bats and started in tightly packed cities before spreading across the world and destroying the world economy? It’s almost like they knew it was coming.

Who are these people, what do they want, why are they trying to force humanity into a Great Reset that nobody is asking for, and where do we go from here? The answers may be surprising to most people, but this could be the most important news story that most people have never heard of.
